metadata.title: CVE-2016-4021 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
The read_binary function in buffer.c in pgpdump before 0.30 allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop andCPU consumption) via crafted input, as demonstrated by the \xa3\x03 string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pgpdump - 0.31-0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pgpdump package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31-0.2').
